Replace.Text: Under the whole world, there is no royal land
秦始皇建立城市获得大量额外领土，其治下所有领土+1 [ICON_Food] 食物 [ICON_Production] 产能 [ICON_Gold] 金币 [ICON_Science] 科研 [ICON_Culture] 文化 和 [ICON_Faith] 信仰。

Qin Shihuang established cities to obtain a large number of additional territories. All the territories under his rule + 1 [ICON_Food] food [ICON_Production] capacity [ICON_Gold] gold [ICON_Science] scientific research [ICON_Culture] culture and [ICON_Faith].
